title: Dictionaries for Lingvo x5 ( ENG - ENG ) [2007-2009, LSD]
description:
Dictionaries for Lingvo x5 ( ENG  ENG ) [2007-2009, LSD]



Year/Date Of Release: 2007-2009
Version: 2, 3, 5
Developer: Longman, Cambridge, Macmillan, Merriam-Webster

System requirements: Having installed ABBYY Lingvo
Description:

Installation instructions

Torrent contains compiled versions of dictionaries
The compiled version can be connected to the Lingvo x5 version. 
In Lingvo select "tools" -> "Add a dictionary from a file" and specify the file "*.lsd" from the catalog.

To correctly display the phonetic transcription and some characters in the dictionary entries 
is needed in the parameters Lingvo install Unicode font (e.g. 'Arial Unicode MS') for text cards
